title: Homeguard changes

embed.description: Greetings, Summoners. Welcome to patch 5.23, the oneafter preseason. Unlike some of our pre-preseason patches before this, we're taking more of a shotgun when it comes to balance - surgical tuning works once we have a better idea of the game's landscape, but when there's such a depth of experimentation and unknowns running around, we've got a lot of targets to get through.

body:
Hey everyone!

What are your thoughts on the changes to homeguard?

I kinda like it myself It gives me the freedom to pick up other boot enhancements that I would prefer over homeguard in every situation now. What are your thoughts on the change?

replies.body:
RIP the TP Homeguard plays.

 I think its fine I just think the snowballing thing will get worse though. GL getting back to defend quickly against a Jax who just 2v1'd your Jungle/Top and is pushing to the inhib tower.

means i can freely get my captain boots on janna and alacrity on talon :)

(rip early homeguard for faster laning tho)
